title: Sweet Strawberry You're Mine
alternative_title: スイートストロベリー・ユアマイン; 你是我的甜心草莓; 스위트 스트로베리 유어 마인;
status: スイートストロベリー・ユアマイン; 你是我的甜心草莓; 스위트 스트로베리 유어 마인;
description:
Description :
        Despite his cool appearance, Okasato Azusa is a 25 year-old literary editor who likes cute and girly things. For a long time, he's had an unrequited love for Maki Naoya, the writer he's in charge of. Maki is a handsome best-selling romance novelist from a wealthy family. And a 27 year-old straight man who loves women... Azusa, however, is the person he loves most in the world, and the closest to him - always diligently serving and spoiling him... Nevertheless, one drunken night, Azusa's long-standing unrequited love spins out of control...?!+
